title: Luminary First Look: Opening Night of Gio Swaby: Fresh Up
title_display: Luminary First Look: Opening Night of Gio Swaby: Fresh Up
hero_caption: Gio Swaby. My Hands Are Clean 4, (detail), 2017. Courtesy of Claire Oliver and Ian Rubenstein. © Gio Swaby.
short_description:
Join Luminary members and special invited guests to preview and celebrate the opening of the exhibition Gio Swaby: Fresh Up. This First Look starts with a conversation between Gio Swaby and curator Melinda Watt and a preview of the Bahamian artist's first-ever career retrospective. Together, we’ll take an intimate and in-depth look at Swaby's richly colored, large-scale, mixed-media works. Then we'll carry the conversation forward with a cocktail reception featuring the artist, curators, and fellow members.

Use the Modern Wing entrance at 159 East Monroe Street; valet and coat check will be available.
list_description: Join Luminary to celebrate the opening of the exhibition Gio Swaby: Fresh Up. Together, we’ll take an in-depth look at Swaby's first-ever career retrospective, featuring many of her richly colored, large-scale, mixed-media works.
description:
Join Luminary members and special invited guests to celebrate the opening of the exhibition Gio Swaby: Fresh Up. Together, we’ll take an in-depth look at the artist’s first-ever career retrospective, featuring many of her richly colored, large-scale, mixed-media works. Preview the exhibition before it opens to the public, then enjoy a cocktail reception with the artist, curators, and fellow members.

Attendance at First Look is exclusive to Luminary members, special guests, and exhibition sponsors. Invitations will be sent to eligible individuals, and advance registration by March 29 is required.

ABOUT THE ARTIST

CONTACT US

Interested in increasing your donation in order to attend? Please reach out to us at luminary@artic.edu to join a dedicated community of art enthusiasts and begin enjoying all the exclusive benefits of Luminary, including compelling programs with artists and curators, behind-the-scenes tours, VIP tickets, and invitations to travel.
